ops_per_clock_notes.bf16: 128 cores x 2 AMX tiles x 128 ops/tile/clock = 32,768 BF16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 128 cores x 2 AMX tiles x 256 ops/tile/clock = 65,536 INT8 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int4: 128 cores x 2 AMX tiles x 512 ops/tile/clock = 131,072 INT4 ops/clock (enhanced AMX)

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at all_core_boost_mhz (3200 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks. PROJECTED specs.
notes: Granite Rapids (Next-Gen 2024-2025). 128 Redwood Cove P-cores (256 threads). Intel 3 process. Tile-based chiplet design. Enhanced AMX with INT4/FP8 support. 8-channel DDR5-5600. PCIe 6.0 with 96 lanes. CXL 2.0. PROJECTED - not yet shipping.
